import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-anmeldung', templateUrl: './anmeldung.component.html', styleUrls: ['./anmeldung.component.scss'] }) export class AnmeldungComponent { public toggleText = 'Recruiter'; // Startwert public onToggleChange(): void { this.toggleText = this.toggleText === 'Recruiter' ? 'Bewerber' : 'Recruiter'; } }
